QuestData.Title: Trouble Brewing
QuestData.Description: Lots of yetis in Kota, yup. Usually not too dangerous. Usually just eat goots.$B$BThen stupid Cousin Gootfur over at Kota Basecamp fed kafa to the goots, and the yeti ate them goots.$B$BNow they're moody, cranky, sleep a lot but never seem rested. Typical kafa addicts.$B$BGonna come outta those caves soon, I'm sure. Come lookin' for more kafa.$B$BThen we all in trouble.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill 5 Kafa-Crazed Yetis in the caves on Kota Peak.
